notes: Recently renovated interior with new wood-look flooring, fresh white paint, updated kitchen tiles and gas stove, and a clean new bathroom, but the building exterior is an aged 4-story walk-up with visible weathering and no elevatorâ€”stairs at the entrance are a concern with a stroller.
